name: Intro Aeris.js beta Weather Map
tagline: Initial setup, Add weather map tiles layers, adjust layer opacity
body:
### Welcome to Intro Aeris.js beta Weather Map (for Beginners)
Steps to create a basic weather map with Leaflet v0.7.7

1. Setup Aeris.js Weather from an existing Leaflet.js html.
2. Create a Leaflet.js map < http://leafletjs.com/index.html >.
3. Get and Configure an Aeris API key.
4. Add the Aeris Map Tiles Layers: Radar, Infrared Satellite
5. Adjust layer opacity for the Aeris layers set in Step 4.
6. You have created your first weather map with Aeris.js! :)
7. Learn more at Aeris Maps Platform (AMP) < http://www.aerisweather.com/support/docs/aeris-maps/ >

### Weather Map Demo on Codepen
Click here < http://codepen.io/yiuklh/pen/EywpZL > to view.

### BACKGROUND STORY:
After my difficulties looked-up resources from available documentations, which they were often explained in technical manners and usually can't comprehend as a complete beginner learner (some codes were even outdated and thus no longer work when tried the codes). I decided to compile a much easier and updated tutorial targeting for the beginners, which it explains in much simpler steps with hyperlinks only to the info they may need to know and continue learning to build upon from.
